00011 // Inherit from this to get threading.  The usage is:
00012 //     threaded.start()
00013 //     threaded.join()
00014 // Implement the run() function as the thread.
00015 class Threaded {
00016     public:
00017         Threaded();
00018         ~Threaded();
00019         virtual void start();
00020         virtual void stop();
00021         void join();
00022         bool running();
00023     protected:
00024         volatile bool stopRequested;
00025     private:
00026         void startRun();
00027         virtual void run() = 0;
00028         volatile bool _running;
00029         boost::thread * runThread;
00030         //boost::shared_ptr<boost::thread> runThread; 
00031         boost::mutex startup_mutex;
00032         boost::condition startup_condition;
00033 };

00036 struct fltknotify{
00037     boost::mutex m;
00038     boost::condition cond;
00039     Fl_Window *win;
00040 };

00044 class FLTKThread : public Threaded{
00045     private:
00046     boost::mutex vector_lock;
00047     std::vector<fltknotify*> to_notify;
00048     boost::mutex window_lock;
00049     std::vector<ImageWindow*> windows;
00050 
00051     public:
00052     FLTKThread();
00053     ~FLTKThread();
00054     void run();
00055 
00056     friend class FLTKManager;
00057 };
